scripts.prepare: cp ./_templates/template-test-secrets.js ./_end2endTests && mv ./_end2endTests/template-test-secrets.js ./_end2endTests/test-secrets.js && cp ./_templates/template-secrets.js . && mv ./template-secrets.js ./secrets.js && cp ./_templates/template-serverless-config.json . && mv ./template-serverless-config.json ./serverless-config.json
